title: What is the procedure to collect originals if the acknowledgment is lost
content: Iâ€™d also like to mention that I already graduated this year and wanted to know if the procedure changes for that as well.

comments.body: As far as I know , an FIR is needed
Demand it...its yours. You need it for future.
It's pretty simple, just get an online FIR, attach it with a LoR and give it to the accounts department. You should get it in a week or two
Yep this is the procedure, thank you!
